Kratos:

The minion has scaped but she's injuried so she wont go so far, ch=
eck the scanners in order to tell us when the Maximals arrive.


Blacknight=
mare:
The femme fel that she was agonizing, she remembered the bots that sh=
e had loved 



  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alex / rm2kmidi

ject: Re: Blacknightmare


  Celeron got on the radio, pretending as if he =
were still inside the base.

  "Celeron to Kratos; are you there?  What's y=
our status?" he said into the radio.

  Meanwhile... 

  Guardia watched ca=
refully and tried to think of what to do next.

  Meanwhile...

  Lord Pers=
eus' shuttle zoomed toward the landing zone.  (he will arrive in the next p=
ost)

 =
   Furiously continue looking for the femme even more he commanded his troo=
ps to speark and look for Blacknightmare.

    Blacknightmare:

    Blackni=
ghtmare heard  nothing, but she was too wounded to move away, she started t=
o pondering about surrender or fight to death 

      ----- Original Messag=
e -----

   Sent: Friday, November 03, 2006 11:43 PM

re


      Guardia reached the landing zone unharmed and looked around for =
a suitable hill for her to view the action from.  She climbed a small hill =
and pulled out a pair of binoculars, hoping to see what was going on.

    =
  Meanwhile...

      Celeron was amused by this battle.  Though he didn't =
really like to participate in combat, he didn't mind watching it; and at ti=
mes he found it to be very entertaining.
